LanguageData.VVE_BasicVehicles.label: базовий транспорт
LanguageData.VVE_BasicVehicles.description: Learn to construct basic, inefficient vehicles, from prowler buggy to roadkill single-person tanks.
LanguageData.VVE_ComplexVehicles.label: складний транспорт
LanguageData.VVE_ComplexVehicles.description: Learn to construct complex vehicles, such as wagons, roadrunners and snatchers, using the components you can easily fabricate.
LanguageData.VVE_AerialVehicles.label: повітряний трансопрт
LanguageData.VVE_AerialVehicles.description: Learn to construct vehicles capable of travelling above the ground, such as a mosquito helicopter and a smuggler cargo airplane.
LanguageData.VVE_CombatVehicles.label: бойовий транспорт
LanguageData.VVE_CombatVehicles.description: Learn to construct complex combat vehicles, such as bulldog battle tanks, tango armored personnel carriers and warbird combat airplanes.
